titles.title: Small Business Start-Up Support Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for business start-up expenditures from $5,000 to $10,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/2008--Introduced. Small Business Start-Up Support Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $5,000 to $10,000 the dollar amount of the tax deduction for trade or business start-up expenditures.
